body:
Yesterday my TS and Overwolf was fine but today i can't seem to get on avicus ts anymore and this same message keeps showing

<18:13:19> Trying to resolve hostname ts.avicus.net
<18:13:19> Failed to resolve hostname 'ts.avicus.net'
<18:15:33> Trying to resolve hostname ts.avicus.net
<18:15:41> Failed to resolve hostname 'ts.avicus.net'
<18:17:57> Trying to resolve hostname ts.avicus.net
<18:18:05> Failed to resolve hostname 'ts.avicus.net'

Is there a way to fix this issue because for some reason i can connect to the default teamspeak server in teamspeak but when i tried to connect even with different identities it still wouldnt allow me, is it possible my connection to other servers is affected because yesterday i hopped on a ts server of another team to sub for a scrim and it apparently didn't had a legal license running it.

Any form of Help would be useful!

title: Can't Connect to Avicus TS anymore | HELP!
